DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate B vitamin substitution effect NFL ( neurofilament light protein ) plasma level neurocognitive performance HIV-infected individual increase plasma homocysteine
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin B Plasma Neurofilament Light Protein ( NFL ) HIV-infected Individuals With Increased Plasma Homocysteine
DOC.criteria: 1 . The ability understand give inform consent participate . 2 . HIV1 infect stable ART > 12 month 3 . Plasma HIVRNA < 50 copies/ml 4 . Plasma homocysteine ≥ 12 μmol/L ( subject < 12 μmol/L include analysis secondary endpoint 3 ( see 5.4 ) . 5 . Male female , age 18 old . 1 . Treatment trimethoprimsulfamethoxazole methotrexate 2 . Ongoing B6 , B12 folate substitution 3 . Antiepileptic treatment 4 . Small bowel ventricular resection 5 . Disturbed absorption small bowel ( Mb Crohn , untreated coeliac disease ) 6 . Ongoing neurological disease severe psychiatric disease 7 . Any malignant tumor history . 8 . Severe ongoing infection opportunistic infection 9 . AUDIT > 7 men > 5 woman 10 . MADRS > 20 11 . Significant B12 folate deficiency indicate substitution ( subject offer adequate substitution , include analysis secondary endpoint 3 ( see 5.4 ) ) . 12 . Pregnancy screen visit , plan pregnancy study period exclusion criterion . ( Not due toxicity Triobe , elevate risk prescribed Bvitamins outside trial . If study object get pregnant study , continue study must exclude start treatment Bvitamin treatment Triobe . )
